mapper.insert: insert into catalog_item (CATALOG_ITEM_ID, CATALOG_ID, PAR_CATALOG_ITEM_ID, CATALOG_ITEM_NAME, CATALOG_ITEM_DESC, CATALOG_ITEM_TYPE, CATALOG_ITEM_NBR, CATALOG_ITEM_SORT, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK ) values (#{catalogItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{catalogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parCatalogItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{catalogItemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catalogItemDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catalogItemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catalogItemNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catalogItemSort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update catalog_item set CATALOG_ID = #{catalogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PAR_CATALOG_ITEM_ID = #{parCatalogItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CATALOG_ITEM_NAME = #{catalogItemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATALOG_ITEM_DESC = #{catalogItemDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATALOG_ITEM_TYPE = #{catalogItemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATALOG_ITEM_NBR = #{catalogItemNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATALOG_ITEM_SORT = #{catalogItemSort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CATALOG_ITEM_ID = #{catalogItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select CATALOG_ITEM_ID, CATALOG_ID, PAR_CATALOG_ITEM_ID, CATALOG_ITEM_NAME, CATALOG_ITEM_DESC, CATALOG_ITEM_TYPE, CATALOG_ITEM_NBR, CATALOG_ITEM_SORT, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from catalog_item where CATALOG_ITEM_ID = #{catalogItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select CATALOG_ITEM_ID, CATALOG_ID, PAR_CATALOG_ITEM_ID, CATALOG_ITEM_NAME, CATALOG_ITEM_DESC, CATALOG_ITEM_TYPE, CATALOG_ITEM_NBR, CATALOG_ITEM_SORT, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from catalog_item

select CATALOG_ITEM_ID, CATALOG_ID, PAR_CATALOG_ITEM_ID, CATALOG_ITEM_NAME, CATALOG_ITEM_DESC, CATALOG_ITEM_TYPE, CATALOG_ITEM_NBR, CATALOG_ITEM_SORT, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from catalog_item where CATALOG_ID = #{catalogId}

select CATALOG_ITEM_ID, CATALOG_ID, PAR_CATALOG_ITEM_ID, CATALOG_ITEM_NAME, CATALOG_ITEM_DESC, CATALOG_ITEM_TYPE, CATALOG_ITEM_NBR, CATALOG_ITEM_SORT, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from catalog_item where PAR_CATALOG_ITEM_ID = #{parentId}
